name: MaterialReport
responsibilities: Create a report using the material amount and date.

name: SentMaterialReport
responsibilities: Send a report, it needs a location

name: ReceivedMaterialReport
responsibilities: Receives a report, also shows the origin.

name: EntrepeneurReport
responsibilities: It create a list that contains a entrepeneur's reports.

name: EnterpriseReport
responsibilities: It create a list that contains a enterprise's reports.

name: Company
responsibilities: Guardar la información de las empresas disponibles
Indicar las habilitaciones que necesitará la empresa

name: Entrepeneur
responsibilities: Guardar la información de los emprendedores
Indicar las habilitaciones que necesitará el emprendedor para acceder a los materiales

name: Habilitation
responsibilities: Guardar la información de las habilitaciones (tipo y nivel)
Indicar si se cumplen los requisitos

name: Requirement
responsibilities: Guardar la información de los requisitos (tipo y nivel)
Indicar cuándo se cumplen los requisitos

name: Material
responsibilities: Guarda el nombre del material.
Contiene las unidades del material.
Contiene una serie de requisitos para su operación.

name: MaterialAmount
responsibilities: Calcula el monto total de un material basándose en el material, la cantidad y la o las unidades

name: LocatedMaterial
responsibilities: Conoce la ubicación y cantidad del material.

name: Location
responsibilities: Guarda la ubicación de un material y calcula la distancia entre el material y el receptor del mismo

name: Price
responsibilities: Calcula el precio de un material basándose en la o las unidades, la cantidad y la moneda

name: User
responsibilities: Store information about a program user (type and name)

name: Invitation
responsibilities: Store information about an invitation (the admin who sent the invitation, the company who receives it, the offer it's suggested to make)
Store its current state (pending, accepted, or rejected).
Validate the invitation when the company orders to do so.

name: Offer
responsibilities: Stores information about an offer of materials (the material and amount, the price, and the location of the materials)

name: ConsoleInterface (a.k.a. IClient)
responsibilities: Communicate with the user via the usual input methods

name: ServerInterface (a.k.a. IMemory)
responsibilities: Communicate with the permanent memory of the program (which can be, among other things, a file or a database)
